amendment.description: At the end of the bill (before the short title), insert the following: SEC.___. None of the funds made available by this Act may be used by the Environmental Protection Agency to develop, finalize, promulgate, implement, administer, or enforce any rule under section 112 of the Clean Air Act (42 U.S.C. 7412) that applies to glass manufacturers that do not use continuous furnaces.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Jenkins (WV) amendment (A049) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Jenkins (WV) amendment (A049) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A049) offered by Mr. Jenkins (WV).
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
